text: Ana knareti'ma e'neana, Jisasi'a amage nentaza disaipol naga'a agafa huno zamasamino, Agrama Jerusalemi vanige'za, ugota mono kva (elda) vahe'mo'zane, ugagota pristi vahe'mo'zane, kasegere ugota hu'naza vahe'mo'za, rama'a zampi azeri haviza nehu'za ahe frisageno friteno tagufa knarera otigahie, huno zamasami'ne.
